name: Glitch Garden (kegh)
description:
Glitch Garden

Project 4 from the Learn to Code by Making Games course in Udemy.

If you are having problems seeing the entire game windows, please run FULL SCREEN and it should help.

Finally got this game to a point where I can publish. The game difficulty is dynamic and scales to the users active defender level it may be a bit too hard. Change the difficulty under options if needed.

It is not meant to be exceptionally difficult. I definitely learned a lot with this one.
